title: Man gunned down in car in Hub’s first slay of year
content:
Boston’s first murder of 2015 happened last night in Roxbury when a carload of people was targeted by gunfire, police said.
Police Commissioner William Evans, who was at the scene, said the car was on Harrishof Street about 10:30 p.m. when the people were shot as they sat in the car.
The white sedan full of gunshot victims sped away from the scene and was spotted by police who stopped it at Dale and Walnut streets several blocks away.
One of the men inside was pronounced dead at the scene.
